body_html:
Yeah, I've done that but started to wonder why this didn't throw an error when running the tests.
Turns out my for a, b, c in combinations([True, False], 3) trick didn't actually do what I wanted and never executed the loop body :(
I've then noticed a few more problems with my tests after I corrected that.
I'll fix those and update the PR.

body:
Yeah, I've done that but started to wonder why this didn't throw an error when running the tests.
Turns out my `for a, b, c in combinations([True, False], 3)` trick didn't actually do what I wanted and never executed the loop body :(
I've then noticed a few more problems with my tests after I corrected that.
I'll fix those and update the PR.
